originalUrl.description: URL of original media file; images should be a web-ready JPG

archiveUrl.description: URL of archival media file (e.g. DNG, TIFF, etc), if publicly web accessible

referenceUrl.description: URL of a web representation of media file. Maybe consist of html wrapper, viewer, player, etc

occid.description: Primary Key of occurrence record that media object is associated with. Should be left null if record is not associated with an occurrence.

tid.description: Primary Key of taxon record (e.g. scientific name reference) associated with media object. Should be left NULL if record is associated with an occurrence, since media will inherit occurrence identification. Required if media is not associated with an occurrence record (e.g. field image)

photographer.description: Verbatim name of author/photographer media object. Leave NULL if photographerUid is supplied

photographerUid.description: User Primary Key of photographer, who must have a user account register in the portal

imageType.description: Term name of image type (e.g. stillImage)

caption.description: Consist, free-form text describing content of media object

rights.description: A URI pointing to structured information about rights held in and over the resource (e.g. https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/, https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode)

accessRights.description: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status

locality.description: Short description of locality. Leave null if locality is available via the occurrence record

sourceIdentifier.description: The source identifier, if media was harvested from an external resource

hashFunction.description: Cryptographic hash function used to compute the value given in the Hash Value

hashValue.description: Value computed by a hash function applied to the media that will be delivered at the access point

sortSequence.description: Media sort control within the taxon profile page

sortOccurrence.description: Media sort control within the occurrence profile page

post.description:
If an existing record can be located within target collection based on matching the input identifier, empty (null) target fields will be updated with Skeletal Data.
			If the target field contains data, it will remain unaltered.
			If multiple records are returned matching the input identifier, data will be added only to the first record.
			If an identifier is not provided or a matching record can not be found, a new Skeletal record will be created and primed with input data.
			Note that catalogNumber or otherCatalogNumber must be provided to create a new skeletal record. If processingStatus is not defined, new skeletal records will be set as 'unprocessed'

If identifier field is null, a new skeletal record will be created, given that a catalog number is provided.

country.description: The name of the country or major administrative unit

stateProvince.description: The name of the next smaller administrative region than country (state, province, canton, department, region, etc.)

county.description: The full, unabbreviated name of the next smaller administrative region than stateProvince (county, shire, department, etc.
